description: Try our easy to follow Meredith Dairy Smashed Avo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Toast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Meredith Dairy Smashed Avo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 320g Meredith Dairy Goat Cheese In Olive Oil
1 cup baby spinach and rocket (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut four generous slices of your chosen crusty bread and toast both sides in oven griller or toaster.
Halve the avocados, remove stone and scoop half of one avocado onto each slice of toasted bread. Break up with the back of your spoon or a use a dinner fork.
Use fork to remove Meredith Dairy Marinated Goat Cheese from jar. Add two cubes to each slice. Use your fork and spoon to crumble the goat cheese over the avocado.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil (or use some oil from the Meredith Dairy jar!). Season with fresh ground pepper and sea salt. Garnish with baby spinach, rocket and your choice of fresh herbs.
